title: Neil Wagner and Trent Boult bowl New Zealand to series win
description: The hosts needed only one extended session on day five to blast out the last seven Bangladesh wickets and wrap up victory by an innings and 12 runs

title: We have to bat with guts for longer periods - Mahmudullah
description: Mahmudullah admitted the batsman lacked a clarity of plan to counter Neil Wagner:s "bouncer theory"

title: Ross Taylor double-ton gives New Zealand a shot at victory
description: The hosts declared with a first-innings lead of 221, before taking three Bangladesh wickets in the last 23 overs of the day

title: Bangladesh cricketer Mosharraf Hossain diagnosed with brain tumour
description: The diagnosis, carried out a couple of days ago at a Dhaka hospital, revealed that the tumour is in its early stages

title: Bangladesh seek answers to NZ:s short-ball questions
description: While Bangladesh believe leaving the short ball alone might be the best way to deal with it, New Zealand:s Neil Wagner thinks that tactic plays to his strengths
